com.smjourney.smjourney

Class SolarSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smjourney.smjourney.SolarSystem

  • public class SolarSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A star system class containing and managing Planets. This system is considered "cleared" when every Planet in it is complete.
    Author:
    Ashwin Chakilum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SolarSystem()
      Constructs a SolarSystem that is meant to contain and manage Planets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getCompletionStatuses()
      Retrieves a list of completion statuses for all Planets, in order of organization.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the SolarSystem
      Planet getPlanet(int planetID)
      Retrieves a specific planet from the SolarSystem based on its ID
      int getPlanetCount()
      Retrieves the number of planets in the SolarSystem
      java.util.ArrayList<Planet> getPlanets()
      Retrieves a list of the Planets within the SolarSystem
      java.lang.String getSystemCompletionCode()
      Retrieves the completion code for this SolarSystem, which determines which Planets are complete or not upon reading the code.
      int getSystemID()
      Retrieves the ID of the SolarSystem
      boolean isCleared()
      Retrieves whether the entire SolarSystem is cleared or not, judged by whether all Planets within the SolarSystem are cleared or not.
      void setCompletionStatuses(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> newCompletionStatuses)
      Sets completion statuses for a group of Planets, in order of organization.
      void setName(java.lang.String newName)
      Sets the name of the SolarSystem
      void setPlanets(java.util.ArrayList<Planet> newPlanets)
      Sets a list of the Planets to be contained in the SolarSystem
      void setSystemCompletionCode(java.lang.String newCode)
      Sets the completion code for this SolarSystem, which determines which Planets are complete or not upon reading the code.
      void setSystemID(int newSystemID)
      Sets the ID of the SolarSystem

      • getSystemCompletionCode

        public java.lang.String getSystemCompletionCode()
        Retrieves the completion code for this SolarSystem, which determines which Planets are complete or not upon reading the code.
        Returns:
        systemCompletionCode the completion code

      • setSystemCompletionCode

        public void setSystemCompletionCode(java.lang.String newCode)
        Sets the completion code for this SolarSystem, which determines which Planets are complete or not upon reading the code.
        Parameters:
        newCode - the new completion code

      • isCleared

        public boolean isCleared()
        Retrieves whether the entire SolarSystem is cleared or not, judged by whether all Planets within the SolarSystem are cleared or not.
        Returns:
        isCleared the SolarSystem cleared status
